meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>warm</kanji> <kanji>furnace</kanji> is a furnace for warming you and other things. This is a <vocabulary>fireplace</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>hearth</vocabulary> or even a <vocabulary>stove</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
